Question: On the issue of the initial creation, Ditko states, "I still don't know whose idea was Spider-this person".
Hints: He continues wearing the costume when he returns from the Secret Wars, starting in The Amazing Spider-this person #252.
Spider-this person is one of the most popular and commercially successful superheroes.
Felicia Hardy, the Black Cat, is a reformed cat burglar who had been Spider-this person's girlfriend and partner at one point.
